summary: cognify logo - cognify GmbH offers services in software development, trend analysis & forecasting, process automation & optimization, and data privacy & GDPR consulting. They transform data into valuable insights and build customized machine learning solutions for businesses. The company is based in Salzburg and provides services such as requirement engineering, design & implementation, testing & quality assurance, maintenance & support, anomaly detection & monitoring, demand planning, business intelligence, in-depth data analysis, process analysis, optimization, automation, monitoring & measurement, initial consultation, status quo analysis, documentation & reporting, and implementation support.
